verbs.description: Donald Trump [V: has] forever changed the nature of politics in America . Thanks to him , we are now firmly ensconced in the era of “ whoever says the most outrageous thing wins . ” His frenetic tweeting , outright racism and sexism , cruelty , lack of knowledge ...
